title: Disney Junior Music Lullabies Bedtime Plush, Mickey Mouse, Amazon Exclusive, by Just Play
features: This product ships in packaging that reveals what's inside and cannot be hidden.
Cuddle up, it’s time for bed.
This interactive plush plays soothing bedtime lullabies.
Collect both Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse.
description: Cuddle up, it’s time for bed. The Disney Junior Music Lullabies Bedtime Plush Mickey Mouse is ready for bedtime. Simply give Mickey Mouse a hug to activate a soothing lullaby song. Mickey Mouse is wearing adorable pajamas made of super soft fabrics that feature a cute pattern. This cuddly musical plush plays soothing bedtime lullabies to help your little one settle down for naptime or bedtime. Requires 3 X AG13 batteries (included). Ages 18 months +
